segment.source: As an infrastructure administrator, you must provide a secure, productive, and supportable, environment.
segment.target: As an infrastructure administrator, you must provide a secure, productive, and supportable, environment.

segment.source: Security for the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) system relies on proper setup of the software and the environment in which it operates.
segment.target: Security for the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) system relies on proper setup of the software and the environment in which it operates.

segment.source: This section of the Planning and Deployment Guide provides guidance for configuring the various App-V components to enhance the security of your environment.
segment.target: This section of the Planning and Deployment Guide provides guidance for configuring the various App-V components to enhance the security of your environment.

segment.source: You should carefully consider the exposure and attack surface of your App-V environment before deciding to deploy a system without applying the security recommendations outlined in this section.
segment.target: You should carefully consider the exposure and attack surface of your App-V environment before deciding to deploy a system without applying the security recommendations outlined in this section.

segment.source: Provides overview information about the security and protection of your App-V system.
segment.target: Provides overview information about the security and protection of your App-V system.

segment.source: Provides information you can use to configure the Application Virtualization Management Server and Application Virtualization Streaming Server.
segment.target: Provides information you can use to configure the Application Virtualization Management Server and Application Virtualization Streaming Server.

segment.source: Provides information you can use to configure the Application Virtualization Management Desktop Client.
segment.target: Provides information you can use to configure the Application Virtualization Management Desktop Client.

segment.source: Provides information you can use to configure the Application Virtualization Sequencer.
segment.target: Provides information you can use to configure the Application Virtualization Sequencer.

segment.source: Planning for Application Virtualization System Deployment
segment.target: Planning for Application Virtualization System Deployment
